title: Windows 7 Ultimate SP1 AIO 11in1 Pre-Activated en-US Aug 2013
description:
Win7.AIO.11in1.en-US.Aug2013

[ RELEASE INFO ]

  File:		Win7.AIO.11in1.en-US.Aug2013.iso
  Source:	32bit: X17-59463 & Enterprise: Original DVD (677651)
		64bit: X17-59465 & Enterprise: Original DVD (677710)
		
  Size: 	5,97GB
  Format: 	Bootable ISO
   
  CRC32: 	c156d1de
  MD5:		c85d823e0ff5d1e3cde3548aef33fe1f
  SHA-1: 	a77a00b2fb45b2a680b34ea52128a3c44638d4b6
   
[ CONTENTS ]

  Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:
  * .NET Framework 4.5.1
  * Hotfixes - 2013-08-13
  * Internet Explorer 10

  Setupcomplete / Post-install:
  * DirectX 9.0c - June 2010
  * KB890930
  * Defender Updates

  Limited to Pre-Activated:
  * Windows Loader 2.2.1 by Daz

[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

  32-bit:
  * Windows 7 Starter SP1
  * Windows 7 Home Basic SP1
  * Windows 7 Home Premium SP1
  * Windows 7 Professional SP1
  * Windows 7 Ultimate SP1
  * Windows 7 Enterprise SP1

  64-bit:
  * Windows 7 Home Basic SP1
  * Windows 7 Home Premium SP1
  * Windows 7 Professional SP1
  * Windows 7 Ultimate SP1
  * Windows 7 Enterprise SP1

[ COMMENTS ]

  Changes since last release:
  * Reverted back to original background image in setup due to demand.
  * Activation is moved to an interactive choice in the last phase of setup.
  * Included optional software; 7-zip, WinRAR, ImgBurn

  Activation info:
  * If you want to activate Windows, please select an activation method when presented the
    choice. 
  * If you are installing Enterprise, select Enterprise Only. 
  * For all other editions, select Windows Loader.

 <a href=" http://i.imgur.com/lHKkjhz.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://i.imgur.com/lHKkjhz.png</a>
  
  * When you have selected your options in Windows Post-Install, select Begin Install.
  * Selected software will be installed automatically. 
  (NOTE: Activation requires a reboot to take effect.)

 <a href=" http://i.imgur.com/dqMJTDV.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://i.imgur.com/dqMJTDV.png</a>


  Useful links:
  * How to burn a DVD from an iso file:
 <a href=" http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows7/burn-a-cd-or-dvd-from-an-iso-file" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows7/burn-a-cd-or-dvd-from-an-iso-file</a>

  * How to install Windows 7 step-by-step:
 <a href=" http://www.tweakhound.com/windows7/install7.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.tweakhound.com/windows7/install7.html</a>

  Hope you will enjoy this release!

  Regards,
  Generation2
